column2: this was an exceptional experience. The ambiance was romantic and the server seemed extremely knowledgeable about the menu. She was able to make recommendations
column3: tell us about the size of the portions
column4: tell us what foods and drinks would pair well together
column5: etc. She had several tables but did not seem rushed at all - she took her time with us. Everything came out exactly as it was ordered - nothing was missing or over/undercooked. Only complaint would be that there was not much space between our table and the table next to us so I felt like I was on a double date with the couple sitting beside us. We could hear their conversation and I'm sure they could hear ours. Overall
column6: the food tasted amazing and experience was awesome.
